short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YTCompact - compact mode for YouTube. Customize YouTube grid view, remove distracting elements and prevent sucked into rabbit hole.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash a streamlined and distraction-free YouTube experience with YTCompact, the browser extension designed to transform your video-watching routine. Say goodbye to clutter and hello to efficiency as YTCompact empowers you with a customized grid view, ensuring a compact layout that maximizes your screen real estate.

Key Features:

    Compact Grid View: Enjoy a condensed YouTube grid view that optimizes the display of video thumbnails, allowing you to see more content at a glance. YTCompact's intuitive design ensures a seamless browsing experience, perfect for those who prefer a minimalist layout.

    Distracting Elements Be Gone: Bid farewell to unnecessary distractions! YTCompact intelligently removes superfluous elements, decluttering the YouTube interface and enabling you to focus solely on the videos that matter most. No more ads or sidebar distractions pulling your attention away from the content you love.

    Escape the Rabbit Hole: Break free from the endless scroll and prevent getting sucked into the YouTube rabbit hole. YTCompact includes features to set video time limits, providing gentle reminders to help you maintain a healthy balance between entertainment and productivity.

    Customization Options: Tailor your YouTube experience to fit your preferences. YTCompact allows you to customize the grid size, video display settings, and more, ensuring that your YouTube journey is as unique as you are.

    Seamless Integration: YTCompact seamlessly integrates into your browser, enhancing your YouTube experience without compromising performance. Compatible with major browsers, this extension ensures a smooth and efficient user experience across platforms.

    Ad-Free Experience: Enjoy uninterrupted video watching with YTCompact's built-in ad-blocker. Say goodbye to pesky ads and experience YouTube the way it was meant to be - ad-free and focused on the content that matters to you.

Upgrade your YouTube experience today with YTCompact - the browser extension that puts you in control. Rediscover the joy of watching videos without the unnecessary noise, and take charge of your online time like never before. Download YTCompact now and witness a new era of YouTube simplicity!
